Figure 3 shows the medians and 25–75% ranges for the GMST projections relative to pre-industrial levels for the climate scenarios considered, obtained using PAGE-ICE with the legacy values of the PCF and SAF. For the PCF, the legacy value is zero emissions from permafrost since the PCF is not included in most climate projections using GCMs
18 . For the SAF, the legacy value is constant SAF of 0.35 ± 0.05 W m −2 K −1, which corresponds to 2 × CO 2 equilibrium climate sensitivity (ECS) calibrated according to IPCC AR5. In subsequent sections, our main results report the difference between the climatic and economic impacts of the nonlinear PCF and SAF and their respective legacy values. Further details appear in Methods.
